Tracey Castle found guilty of intentionally driving her ute into woman after New Plymouth street fight https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/nz/tracey-castle-found-guilty-guilty-of--intention-driven-driving-riving-her-ute-into-woman-woman-woman---------------------- https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/nz/tracey-castle-found-guilty-guilty-of--intention-driven-driving-riving-her-ute-into-woman-woman-woman---------------------- Tara Shaskey'By that point, there was no time to move.
